Social And Cultural Activities: (i) Lanco Foundation (Humantarian Trust primarily focuses on providing aids and appliances to the physically challenged or differently abled people through artificial limb centres etc.); and (ii) Rajagopal Foundation established for, utensils and other household needs to flood and fire victims in Krishna District and for grants of scholarships to meritorious poor students and also extend medical facilities to poor and downtrodden initiated "Sujalavahani" drinking water bore-well programme; organised blood donation camps, health camps, sports meets; actively associated with Red Cross and similar other organisations; promoted and encouraged Kondapalli Art; and organised Tiranga Run in memory of Late Shri Pingali Venkayya, a great Patriot, who designed the Indian National Flag.
Educational Qualifications: B. Tech. (Mechanical) Educated at Siddhartha Engineering College, Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh
Other Information: Participated in (i) 1,500 km. `Praja Prasthanam Padayatra`; (ii) 2,000 km. `Bullet Yatra` ; and (iii)110 km. `Jawahar Jyothi Padyatra`; and undertaken various Pada Yatras covering 5,000-and-odd kms. by visiting almost every house twice in Vijaywada Constituency.
